title: Cozy Beachfront Cottage
description: A charming 2-bedroom cottage with direct beach access and stunning ocean views.

inquiries.message: I'm interested in learning more about this property. Could you please provide additional details about the beach access and ocean views?
What is the estimated monthly mortgage payment for this property?
Are there any HOA fees associated with this property?

title: Urban Penthouse Suite
description: A luxurious penthouse with panoramic city views, private elevator, and high-end finishes.

inquiries.message: Can you provide information about the amenities and facilities included in this penthouse?
What is the estimated monthly rental income potential for this property?
Are there any restrictions on short-term rentals for this property?

title: Rural Agricultural Land
description: Expansive agricultural land with fertile soil and irrigation systems, perfect for farming.

inquiries.message: What is the soil quality and suitability for different crops on this land?
Is there sufficient water availability for irrigation?
Are there any zoning restrictions or permits required for agricultural use?

title: Historic Townhouse
description: A beautifully restored 3-bedroom townhouse in a historic district, combining charm with modern amenities.

inquiries.message: What is the historical significance of this townhouse?
Are there any renovations or updates planned for this property?
What are the property taxes for this townhouse?
